# fastspin progressive colors

0 off
1 red
2 green
3 blue

solid
1,0,0,0,0,50,100
0,1,0,0,0,50,100
0,0,1,0,0,50,100
0,0,0,1,0,50,100
0,0,0,0,1,50,100

0,2,0,0,0,50,100
0,0,2,0,0,50,100
0,0,0,2,0,50,100
0,0,0,0,2,50,100
